title: IT60117: Applied Computer Vision - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: A Course in Image ProcessingIntroduction and Overview; Image formation concepts; Camera models and Optics; Camera Parameters; Camera calibration (Epipolar geometry); Fundamental and Essential Matrix; Noise Estimation and Removal; Feature extraction overview; Feature detection; 3D sensing; Surface reconstruction; Active Vision/control; Vision and learning.
